key.name: default-width
key.description: Default width for new sticky notes in pixels.

key.name: default-color
key.description: Default color for new sticky notes. This can be standard name, hexadecimal value, RGB color or RGBA color.

key.name: default-font-color
key.description: Default font color for new sticky notes. This can be standard name, hexadecimal value, RGB color or RGBA color.

key.name: default-font
key.description: Default font for new sticky notes. This should be a Pango Font Name, for example "Sans Italic 10".

key.name: sticky
key.description: Specifies whether the sticky notes are visible on ALL workspaces on the desktop, or not.

key.name: locked
key.description: Specifies whether the sticky notes are locked (non-editable) or not.

key.name: date-format
key.description: By default, sticky notes are given the current date as the title when they are created. This format is used; anything that can be parsed by strftime() is valid.

key.name: use-system-color
key.summary: Whether to use the default system color
key.description: If this option is disabled, a custom color can be used as the default color for all sticky notes.

key.name: use-system-font
key.summary: Whether to use the default system font
key.description: If this option is disabled, a custom font can be used as the default font for all sticky notes.

key.name: force-default
key.summary: Whether to force the default color and font on all notes
key.description: If this option is enabled, the custom colors and fonts that have been assigned to individual notes will be ignored.

key.name: desktop-hide
key.summary: Whether to hide all notes when the desktop is selected
key.description: If this option is enabled, selecting the desktop in any way will automatically hide all the open notes.

key.name: confirm-deletion
key.summary: Whether to ask for confirmation when deleting a note
key.description: Empty notes are always deleted without confirmation.
